title: Cheesy Cauliflower Mash
directions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil.
Add the cauliflower and garlic and cook until the cauliflower is soft (15-20 minutes)
Drain and return the vegetables to the pot.
Add buttermilk, butter, salt, and black pepper to taste.
Using an immersion or regular blender, puree the cauliflower.
Stir in the chives and cheddar and serve hot.
ingredients: 7 cups of cauliflower, cut into florets
